channel.title: Top 3 Choices that i can use for my server source?
channel.description:
Well heres a little detail... I'm thinking about creating a server with f2p items p2p features. I will add like skill capes, and a thinking on God Swords. I want to actually run this one and work on it. At the minute i'm trying to find a way to get a source that can hold 100+ people on almost anyones computer. My ultimate goals for the server is 1 versus 1 pking, perfect mini games, perfect defense, and npcs deflecting, defending, and attacking.
I want to get the top 3 Sources and from there I will narrow it down. My ideas are limitless i just need a good starter source. It does not need spiecals or any features as long as it has pvp combat.
Top 3 Suggestions: - - -
My Decision: -
Sorry this is a newbie topic but i can't waste time going through the whole list.
-John

item.title: Top 3 Choices that i can use for my server source?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Well there are some very simple servers that you can edit easily and nothing fancy
-Pimpscape
-Cheezescape PK
-Assassian Scape

Those servers are really good but not as good as others and if you change it people wont b able to find out what its server source was
